short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that makes the news easier to read for liberals and progressives.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are unhappy about the results of the 2016 election, this extension will make the news a little bit easier to read. Replaces select terms with other, more appropriate ones. Good for a laugh or two. Install and read the news as you normally do. Continuously updated with new replacement text.
